<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="55441" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="55441" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.02</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="841">841</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="109"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Terrible Teddy</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Leather fragrance for men. <b>Terrible Teddy</b> was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top note is Incense; middle note is Leather; base note is Ambroxan. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                     </div>
                    </div>
                    Poorly conceived and poorly executed fragrance
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">2</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">30</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Tacky bottle and branding
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>

They have plans to do a lot of evil things. While Valaya shrieks to scare people, Teddy will do the stabbing. This Quentin Bisch creation is an abomination. I cannot pick out any ambery notes in it, only citrusy woody creepy notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2324511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2324511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321302" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sl1108"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2008312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sl1108" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008312">sl1108</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 19:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious soft peppery incense- unexpected favorite from Penhaligon's</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2321302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2321302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SohrabArt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SohrabArt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283831">SohrabArt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance lacks complexity and stays quite linear throughout, which isnt what I would expect from something at this luxury price point.<br />
<br />
With limited notes, it quickly becomes rather dull. Overall, while it smells pleasant, it certainly wouldnt justify the high price if it werent labeled as a luxury item.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2319091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2319091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Turtle2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Turtle2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-Leather-61523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti Leather"title="Halfeti Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962244">Turtle2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 12:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>5mL sample<br />
<br />
Terrible Teddy is one of those that I want to like but its not exactly my cup of tea. While linear, that doesnt make it necessarily a bad thing, but I think this was designed for someone with a specific skin chemistry in mind. Unfortunately that doesnt seem to be my skin type, on me Im getting a bit of smokey pine tar, and the ambroxan, not much else. Longetivity is a couple hours and the sillage is par for the course for Penhaligons, which is to say close to the skin.<br />
<br />
Not worth the price tag, but as stated above, Terrible Teddy is made for a man with a very specific skin chemistry to pull off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2317796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2317796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280849" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bwhupp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2059006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bwhupp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Papilefiko-74667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Papilefiko"title="Papilefiko"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059006">bwhupp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 16:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Excellent opening of smoky incense and peppery accord. Masculine and delightful for the first hour. It was a love! Then... Dried down and started to die quickly. Terrible performance for the price point. Beautiful scent like most in the portraits but performance and sillage are just trash.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2280849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2280849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275996" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Demani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Demani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156">Demani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 11:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get juniper in the opening<br />
And juniper incense in the dry down<br />
There is some abwr and wood accord accompanying it but other than that it os juniper<br />
I wonder if i got the right sample</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2275996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2275996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254946" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 03:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Terrible Teddy is an airy amber-incense scent, rich yet relatively muted, in keeping with the other Portraits I've tried. On smelling this, I also was not surprised that Quentin Bisch is the nose behind this scent, given the rich, well-balanced amber accord and good use of synthetic materials. TT is a lightweight, approachable day-to-night amber.<br />
<br />
TT is has a peppery opening, dry and nose-tickling, quickly giving way to the smooth, balsamic incense. I love a good incense note, and here it is wonderfully churchy. There is a pine-like undertone, elemi-like alongside the amber, bringing to mind cypress. It is all very smooth, with the leather note slowly developing in the background, contributing to the amber accord.<br />
<br />
It becomes woody as it develops, dry and smooth, complementing the amber nicely. There is a smokiness to the base, making things very dry, but it is kept smooth by the smooth leather-amber accord, with lightweight, creamy ambroxan playing a key role here. Sillage and longevity are moderate, and it is masculine-leaning in my opinion, best worn in autumn/winter.<br />
<br />
A lovely masculine-leaning amber scent, TT is multifaceted and beautifully put-together. Everyday elegance, like many Penhaligon's. 4/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2254946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2254946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249589" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeranium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2221825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeranium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); This frag here definitely is a brown scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2249589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2249589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2206525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2206525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184978" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BGBG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BGBG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Visit-For-Men-598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Visit For Men"title="Visit For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277">BGBG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 09:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like black pepper. Masculine. Nice opening but very short living and not projecting well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2184978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2184978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138783" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlucarDFirecaT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlucarDFirecaT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Black-Eau-de-Toilette-18368.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18368.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Eau de Toilette"title="Black Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516130">AlucarDFirecaT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a beautiful discovery!<br />
<br />
An incense, leather aerial and light, which develops and surrounds you with ease!<br />
This one is clearly in the DNA of the house Comme des Garons , and it could be the big brother of incense Kyoto more tenacious.<br />
<br />
Do not rely on the reduced list of notes, it is much deeper than announced, a smell of very light cypress, vtiver and tobacco comes lightened leather incense always in the background, it is a linear fragrance without evolution, but in his case this is rather an advantage because it makes it a safe all-day fragrance!<br />
<br />
Teddy is in the end terribly well made and effective, a real perfume of gentlemen</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2138783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2138783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112762" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 05:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I have mentioned before the Panhaligon portraits fragrances have that thick texture to them . This is no different. <br />
At first to me it's slightly amber but the incense and leather take over quickly.  They are mixed pretty well to where one doesn't over power the other . That scent carries until the fragrance fades. You do get a hefty bit of the ambroxan. While only 3 notes you do catch a few things. I do agree that it has a slight pine tar feel to it. You do get some pine and mint in this. While it is a bold and heavy fragrance . When you get a big whiff you can almost taste it. But it's not super strong. It's not super leathery , the incense isn't strong or smokey . To be honest it kind of has a medicinal smell to it n<br />
I don't hate it but I also don't like it . It's very linear but for what it is it works . I can see this being a signature scent for a man over 32. But even if it is this is super expensive. They need to ditch the bottles and make something more simple. The majority of this collection is too linear to be asking for these crazy prices.  I'm sure the bottle has a lot to do with the price. <br />
Performance<br />
It projects for a good hour or 2.  But it's more of a thick intimate skin scent. 2 sprays on the wrist lasts about 4 to 5 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2112762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2112762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Douggie T-Ray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1907000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Douggie T-Ray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907000">Douggie T-Ray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a tester of this. It smells brilliant. Great silage, stays strong and dominant for about 2 hours but then just vanishes off my skin. What a wonderful 2 hours they are though. Perhaps I went anosmic from smelling it too much. The incense is prominent but not overdone, and mixes well with the leather and woodsy accords. The ambroxan is strong and reminds me of Sauvage, but I prefer this one by far. Its got a dirty, but well groomed presence that makes me think of Alan Quartermaine or some other dapper steampunk adventurer. Spray this on and you will feel like going on your own journey to the centre of the Earth. I would definitely consider this for a full bottle if the longevity was better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2073294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2073294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066523" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066523" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xvxmatthewxvx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1028003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xvxmatthewxvx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Five-O-Clock-Au-Gingembre-2764.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2764.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"title="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066523ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066523" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003">xvxmatthewxvx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 17:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this is much more complex than the notes listed. I smell leather, papyrus, oud, mint or geranium, &amp; a smoky wood like birch or cade. The late dry down develops into a strong musky aftershave smell. I cant quite put my finger on it but its like an inky combination of oakmoss, musk, &amp; juniper. It reminds me of something Ive smelled in Van Cleef Pour Homme, Drakkar Noir, English Leather, or Old Spice. Very masculine dark scent. Lasts over night with strong to medium projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2066523"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2066523#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Incredibly linear. The initial spray only differs in that it's stronger. Sillage and longevity leave a lot to be desired. This scent with good performance would have a place in my wardrobe. As is I'll pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2053213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2053213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213067">Elindio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-13">01/13/24 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it is the older brother of the B683, this one is harsher with the leather and a little smoky as the b683 is lighter and airier. good projection the first two hours before it becomes very close to the skin. I prefer the B683</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2029953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2029953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018782" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SammyyyZEEEEEEE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1569832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1569832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SammyyyZEEEEEEE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1569832">SammyyyZEEEEEEE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 07:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The name is spot on, this is terrible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2018782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2018782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2014096" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2014096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2014096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-29">12/29/23 08:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hi Teddy.<br />
In the opening; this might be the pepperiest pepper I've ever come across. Real, authentic table pepper.<br />
Some cumin aswell. My mum used to keep a big container with all of her spices inside, Teddy reminded me of opening it up as a kid and being hit by spicyness galore.<br />
<br />
A good dose of aromatic greenery in the middle. Pine and maybe a hint of patchouli. A touch of herbality, strong black tea, oregano, rosemary.<br />
<br />
Some very nice earthiness in the base. Leather with a soapiness to it. I do get some smokey frankincense, but not as much as others seem to.<br />
<br />
Pine tar!<br />
<br />
Pretty linear in it's development, which is fine by me because I'm quite enjoying Teddy's character.<br />
Also performance seems a bit better than other Penhaligon's fragrances.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: I imagine this would be pretty polarising. I think Teddy is gorgeous, but he's too masculine for me.<br />
Will be signature worthy for some.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2014096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2014096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993307" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WeezyPipes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WeezyPipes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993307ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993307" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595">WeezyPipes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a Lipton iced tea on paper, reminds me of Ombre Merveilles. I'm baffled by the notes and reviews.  I like it but in this price range you can do better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1993307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1993307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Esna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.130358.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Esna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parle-Moi-de-Parfum/Comete-Paradis-62-88761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comte Paradis 62"title="Comte Paradis 62"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358">Esna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-27">11/27/23 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A classico but done better. Ive tried almost all from this brand and this is the one I liked the most but for my BF; its too masculine for me. I really wanted a scent from this brand for me but I didnt connect with any others. Might let my samples sit for a while a give them a try later. Weather I connect to a scent or not, these all do smell really good regardless and are worth a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1986669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1986669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816892">Christos08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 10:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is basically Tom fords Costa azzura parfum but Mr teddy is slightly stronger on the opening but they dry down so similar it's hard to differentiate between them I have tested them both for a few days my verdict is Mr teddy is the better performer of the 2 plus the bottle and packaging are worth the extra it delivers decent niche quality where as Tom fords is a designer fragrance so as usual few hours and it's gone</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1984932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1984932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1983618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1983618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1973064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1973064" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Parfu4me"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820340"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1820340.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Parfu4me" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/French-Leather-28049.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28049.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Leather"title="French Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1973064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1973064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820340">Parfu4me</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-10">11/10/23 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was not sure what to expect from a fragrance that consists of 3 notes, of which incense is not one of my most favorite notes. But.... I love it! I have it for about 3 hours now and I keep smelling my wrists. I like it much more in dry down, than in the opening. It's so soft, cozy, warm, tender, sophisticated, sweet (but not sugary or candy sweet, more liquor or balsam sweet), rich, expensive and elegant aroma! I smell the resemblance to B683 indeed, but that one is harsher, more metallic, while this one is soft, like a warm favorite cashmere sweater. The fragrance is so rich, I, too, smell much more notes in it: tobacco, coffee, rum, some animalistic notes, wood. I love it and would love to wear it, it is definitely just as good frag for women, as for men. I can imagine this fragrance would smell very differently on different skins.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1973064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1973064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1959148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1959148" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LeatherCouch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LeatherCouch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Sport-14185.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14185.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LEau dIssey Pour Homme Sport"title="LEau dIssey Pour Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1959148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1959148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991">LeatherCouch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think it's a great fragrance but absurdly overpriced. At this price point you want something that lasts and projects all day,and yes, it's better to put less than put a lot. This fragrance has good longevity and sillage but for the price point it's just no enough.<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity 7/10<br />
Sillage 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1959148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1959148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945755" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EauDeBaldy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259496.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EauDeBaldy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/CH-Men-Prive-31508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CH Men Prive"title="CH Men Prive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259496">EauDeBaldy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has a very familiar profile. I get the feeling I have smelled this before but, I haven't ( maybe it's from the Ambroxen or something )<br />
<br />
With that said, it's a really nice, mature, office type of fragrance that is excellent for the fall time.<br />
<br />
It's nothing too extraordinary but, it's a nice masculine, amber type of fragrance thats worth a sample for sure. A buy? That's something for you to decide. It doesn't really change up overtime. What you smell initially is what you get throughout, which is good but not wow ( for this price point )</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1945755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1945755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1941016" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SculptureOfSoul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/29466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.29466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SculptureOfSoul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Guilty-Elixir-de-Parfum-pour-Homme-84547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme"title="Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1941016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1941016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/29466">SculptureOfSoul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-30">09/30/23 09:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe it's not fair but I tend to have an expectation for a scent that costs as much as this (for only 75ml no less!), that the scent smells rich and full and luxurious. You could design the best family sedan but good luck selling it for $100k, there's just an upper limit of what people will spend for that type of car. I feel like that's the issue here.<br />
<br />
Terrible Teddy is by all accounts a nice fragrance. It starts with a pretty airy frankincense that is flanked by pink and black pepper. Over the coming hours it transitions into a slightly sweetened pine sap and needle smell, and lurking deep in the base is the same leather accord from Gucci Guilty absolute - just with a bit less heft due to the lack of patchouli. <br />
<br />
It's simple and smells good, but I feel like I should like it more than I actually do. I think what is holding it back is that, as many have noted, it has a synthetic quality to it. I don't mind synthetics at all... the issue here is that the scent profile is something so natural (pine + frankincense) that, the effect of it smelling unnatural is akin to a beautiful vase filled with plastic flowers; or eagerly biting into a piece of fruit only to find out it's fake. <br />
<br />
I realized that whenever I'm in the mood for this scent profile I would reach for Memo's Shams Oud over this. They don't smell the same, although they both do scratch that peppery/incense/pine (sap) itch; Shams is fuller and richer and smells like a lot of rich naturals are used. <br />
<br />
Still, if you want an airy CdG-style pine incense with some of that Guilty Absolute leather accord, do check this out!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1941016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1941016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1936335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1936335" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YjiX3MR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="YjiX3MR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1936335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1936335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491959">YjiX3MR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 14:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are some notes missing: pink pepper, cedar, vetiver to name a few. It's a nice spicy masculine fragrance that also has some sweetness to balance it out. It's however overpriced for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1936335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1936335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929112" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40660">leto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 01:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All of the perfumes in this animal head cap series are seriously overpriced compared to competition. They all smell nice though.<br />
<br />
Terrible Teddy smells nice as well but it's just another tweak of the perfumer's another work. B683 (2016) of Quentin Bisch smells very, very close to this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1929112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1929112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
