Smells ok, but definitely not worth the high retail price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1908886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1908886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908494" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908494" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AhmedElbahja95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1793463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AhmedElbahja95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908494ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908494" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463">AhmedElbahja95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this a great scent. I really like Terrible Teddy. This is my favourite from the portraits collection. I went through 70% of a bottle in less than a year. What a powerful, manly fragrance this is. This isn't for everyone, so I wouldn't recommend blind buying. However, it's still a huge compliment getter. I give this 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1908494"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1908494#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905900" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myrtillajus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myrtillajus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368">Myrtillajus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 02:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>And nothing, bow down again to another masterpiece of my favorite nose: Quentin Bisch.<br />
Terrible Teddy wants to represent an aristocratic man, who lives in the English countryside, with an apparently hard and strong, virile and sensual character, but which hides tenderness inside. In short, a hunter who in turn is hunted.<br />
Here we have a peppery opening, which paves the way for incense and finally leather, giving life to a decisive, strong fragrance that I would always wear. I love it . He is virile and sensual at the same time, and, I will repeat myself because I often say it, a perfume like this on a woman gives her that something extra, it makes her stand out.<br />
I recommend it for autumn-winter, on me trail and persistence are really excellent.<br />
The return from the hunt painted by Courbet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1905900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1905900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1897366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1897366" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentnavigator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466717"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentnavigator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1897366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1897366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466717">scentnavigator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-08">08/08/23 17:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While I enjoy some of Bischs old work, I have found his recent compositions tend to be rather derivative, usually a form of variations on a similar theme, and all with staggering doses of aromachemicals.  I hope he returns to his old form soon, otherwise I have likely bought my last bottle of his.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1897366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1897366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1890815" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1890815" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1890815ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1890815" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 00:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First Impression on skin. I've considered blind buying this a couple times and I'm glad I didn't.Very disappointed in this release from Penhaligon's which is a house I generally like. This feels synthetic and unfinished. You get whisperers of incense, whisperers of animalics and leather, and a boatload ambroxan. I'm not an ambroxan hater, but this blend smells like plastic. This fixative was a very poor choice IMO. It works in Lord George but fails here. <br />
Granted, I haven't spent much time with it,  but I doubt my opinion will deviate much for from the last hour or so. Bois d'Encens smells better than this one and without the plastic smell. I'll update my review if my opinion changes, but so far Terrible Teddy is indeed, terrible. <br />
<br />
Scent 3.5/10<br />
Performance 7.5/10<br />
<br />
Update: eh, my opinion hasn't changed much. I like it slightly better but still not on brand for Penhaligon's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1890815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1890815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869623" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whateverwhocares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whateverwhocares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007">Whateverwhocares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-02">07/02/23 12:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another airy,  costly, I mean ghostly presence more transparent than a window pane. Theres a hint, no, a suggestion of leather in here somewhere. For the gentleman who wants to keep a low profile. Distinctly Penhaligons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1869623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1869623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862764" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mdk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1756484.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mdk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-des-Sens-Eau-de-Toilette-35678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"title="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1756484">Mdk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hmm, unfortunately I don't think it's worth the price.<br />
I like the scent of incense, but I find Teddy to be very flat. And it's a scent I've already smelled somewhere... I'm not familiar with men's perfume so I can't name it, but it's definitely a scent I know.<br />
Even if you don't buy this from a niche brand, I have a feeling you can probably find this scent at mass market perfume stores.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1862764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1862764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852301" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feuermaiden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feuermaiden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boy-Smells/Woodphoria-75837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woodphoria"title="Woodphoria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852301ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852301" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-08">06/08/23 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one leans a little too masculine for my tastes during the opening, but sometimes I get whiffs of it in the dry down and change my mind. <br />
<br />
It drys down and smells almost *exactly* like dragons blood incense. And I love that smell. Very woody and just slightly smoky. You definitely get the ambroxan in the dry down as well. This also did not tend to project very far when I put it on - it stayed close to the skin. <br />
<br />
I dont think Ill be buying the full bottle of this one because I dont prefer to wear overly masculine scents myself, but I would love this on my husband!! Very dapper scent.<br />
<br />
EDIT: After a few more wears, I changed my mind. Im now obsessed. The peppery opening doesnt even matter because it immediately settles into straight up Dragons Blood incense and I just want to sniff myself all day. This is not the Nag Champa kind of incense. So glad I kept giving this chances because Ive been looking for a scent that captures that dragons blood smell and this does just that perfectly. Ill buy the full bottle one day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1852301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1852301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852076" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FirstSense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1323175.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FirstSense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852076ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852076" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323175">FirstSense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-08">06/08/23 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A couple of things came up in my mind. Pinewood, fresh green herbs from the forrest and Creed Aventus and Viking Cologne. This is a fresh green masculine scent with amber in the base. Okay, it's ambroxan, and a rather nice variety. I'm not a big fan of this aroma chemical but in this Penhaligon's it's really good. It's a beautiful fougere fragrance with a excellent silage. But I stick with my Loewe Esencia (original formulation in the round bottle). For me that's the king of fougeres. But Terrible Teddy is a real good and well made perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1852076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1852076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844715" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DREDAY"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DREDAY" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-Man-920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection Man"title="Reflection Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844715ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844715" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490444">DREDAY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-29">05/29/23 19:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Compliment machine. I traded a bottle of Aventus for this masterpiece. Simple yet powerful and effective to get tons of attention. <br />
Opens with a smooth smoke and leather and quickly get even smoother with an overload of salty citrusy ambroxan. I've heard actual ambergris is used in the masterful compilation. To sum it up very masculine and easy to pull off. Compliments roll in by the ton. Lasts for eternity and sillage is a room filler. You won't find performance like this often. The ambroxan jumps out to carry the heavy notes. Pink pepper and green spiciness attributes the forefront.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1844715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1844715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; And feels wayyyy overpriced for a 75ml esp if I can get similar smells with other brands with better sillage and longevity. Good if u like the brand and/or design?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1832656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1832656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1813062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Also a little too woody for my taste, I kept fighting the urge to sneeze.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1813062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1813062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804347" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804347" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arber Cami"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.102830.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arber Cami" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pigmentarium/Genesis-74523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Genesis"title="Genesis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804347ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804347" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830">Arber Cami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-09">04/09/23 01:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was love at the first snif. Opens up smooth leathery and delicate smoke, in the dry down the leathers becomes smooth like suede, and the ambroxan tones out the smokiness perfectly. Classy, gentleman's fragrance, really versatile and absolutely suited as a year round personal scent. Absolute class.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1804347"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1804347#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1791436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1791436" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lukasssss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lukasssss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1791436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1791436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553">Lukasssss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-24">03/24/23 06:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening reminds me a little of Arso by Profumum Roma, but Terrible Teddy is less sweet and even has a little salty quality to it. Definitely has a touch of pine and/or cedar even though it is not officially stated.<br />
Contrary to what I expected, this fragrance is actually pretty clean and sophisticated for being an incensy leather scent. I think this can be attributed to the ambroxan, which seems to add volume and a slight sweetness to the otherwise pretty heavy top and middle notes. <br />
Some words that come to my mind when I smell it are: woodwork, sauna, smoke, tar, pinewood, sap, incense. <br />
Smells outdoorsy and dressed up at the same time. Quite versatile.<br />
I like it and I think it is very well crafted. This gets a 7/10 from me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1791436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1791436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NotAnEqualizer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NotAnEqualizer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437125">NotAnEqualizer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 11:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a comforting, gentlemanly scent. The scent profile is quite simple, but it smells of very good quality. You can't wear this with a T-shirta collared shirt is a must.<br />
<br />
It smells like a young man sitting in his grandpa's study room, rummaging his books, sitting at his home-built wooden desk, somewhere up in the mountains around pine trees. This is the man who can chop wood during the day, dress up in a suit and drive 45 minutes into town for a soire.<br />
<br />
When I smell it, I think of a brown or charcoal suit, books, carpentry, a pocket full mints, virility, and comforting strength.<br />
<br />
Imagine Acqua di Gio Profumo, but without the fresh aquatic notes. It's got that high-quality incense note that people love from Profumo. Although Terrible Teddy isn't a fresh scent, it's clean and neutral enough for all seasons. It's not sweet, but rather peppery-sweet with almost a brightness to it (like pink pepper or cinnamon). There's not that much sweetness, so it's not going to be cloying during the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1786683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1786683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1785244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1785244" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1785244ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1785244" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-16">03/16/23 15:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oooh this scent reminds me of a cheeky yet humble lad at a bar who makes you have butterflies with just his banter. It's such a nice light musk but has the warmness coming through the incense. Like I just want to steal a cute kiss from this guy, absolutely blushing smelling this fragrance. Brings a smile on my face, with how light the scent feels. It could be a signature scent but I see this scent more on a casual night out.<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Libra Leo Pisces</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1785244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1785244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1782189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1782189" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BGBG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BGBG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Visit-For-Men-598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Visit For Men"title="Visit For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1782189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1782189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277">BGBG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-13">03/13/23 03:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dry woods (cedar and fir/pine) and very nice incense. I am not a big fan of churchy incense. Here it is a light and elegant masculine incense. Similar to Bottega Veneta Pour Homme.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1782189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1782189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1758946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1758946" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lmnsvgz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lmnsvgz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oriana-69117.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69117.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oriana"title="Oriana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1758946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1758946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259533">lmnsvgz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-13">02/13/23 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Each time I smell ambroxan it smells bitter. This one is combined with dry leather and smoke, but the bitterness is the main thing I smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1758946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1758946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1709380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1709380" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HammerDownRollIn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263946"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263946.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HammerDownRollIn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1709380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1709380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263946">HammerDownRollIn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-14">12/14/22 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It immediately reminds me of Soul of the Forest when I first spray it. But then, it becomes more smokey and ambroxany. This is perhaps as well blended as ambroxan can be in a fragrance.<br />
<br />
This is impressive. Its artistic. But, Im just not a fan of ambroxan. Its an unnatural and prominent aroma. And similarities with Soul of the Forest end after the initial spray.<br />
<br />
The smokiness reminds me of Tom Ford Oud and Wood. People who really like that should definitely check this out. Theres no ginger in here, but this does remind me of Bleu de Chanel as well, but its as smokey as Oud and Wood.<br />
<br />
This is definitely masculine by the way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1709380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1709380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1707892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1707892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mountain Air"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1383140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mountain Air" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1707892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1707892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383140">Mountain Air</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-12">12/12/22 15:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I have a signature, go-to fragrance, this is the one. I love it, it has a unique scent and is by far and away the one I receive most positive comments on from both women and men. I note some comparisons to Creed on here, but I really dont get that. It may just be the combination on my skin, but this gives a strong, rich, spicy long lasting effect. Initially it starts off quite peppery, but settles in to warm rich spice, my partner loves it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1707892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1707892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1707679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1707679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Captain Odour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Captain Odour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Amyris-Homme-Extrait-de-Parfum-59744.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59744.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amyris Homme Extrait de Parfum"title="Amyris Homme Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1707679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1707679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506569">Captain Odour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-12">12/12/22 09:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the opening, it reminds me of Creed Viking. Very peppery and spicy. Sadly, I dont get as much incense out of this one as Id like. A nice, simple, well blended autumn and winter scent. Nothing to write home about, but certainly nothing to complain about either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1707679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1707679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699829" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rinlux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rinlux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/Au-Coeur-du-Desert-41053.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41053.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Au Coeur du Dsert"title="Au Coeur du Dsert"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1699829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1699829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1677063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
