padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397982">misosoupy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-29">10/29/22 18:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this might be THE perfume for me. hits all the boxes, smells absolutely divine on my skin, stays longer than what i had anticipated, and evokes strong nostalgia...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1677063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1677063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1669026" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1669026" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stalal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.958408.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stalal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Vodka-on-the-Rocks-23899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vodka on the Rocks"title="Vodka on the Rocks"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1669026ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1669026" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958408">stalal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-18">10/18/22 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you have ever alternated between dry and steam sauna few times, your skin smells like this. Piney, clean, steamy, warm but at the same time aromatic. Right now I don't pick up leather or incense separately (,but then i often start detecting perfumes notes apart after few wears). There is this beautiful pine wood and mixed with freshness. It evokes the feeling of being on your deck after rain at the edge of a forest. This is a strong like!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1669026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1669026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1665357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1665357" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dwt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1566456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dwt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1665357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1665357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566456">dwt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-13">10/13/22 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is possible the weakest fragrance I have ever tried. From the moment it is applied, it is immediately a skin scent. Absolutely no projection, and even the skin scent is gone in about an hour. <br />
That said, it is a nice, slightly peppery leather scent. It's just a shame you have to bury your face in your skin to smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1665357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1665357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1661739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1661739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ash1967"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342031"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ash1967" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Masculin-Pluriel-26252.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26252.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Masculin Pluriel"title="Masculin Pluriel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1661739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1661739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342031">ash1967</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice..especially for those who loves pine scents (dominant), not very long lasting- after 2/3 hours (even on a cold day), stays close to the skin.<br />
From the same neighborhood of comme des garons (pine/pepper) but more easy going not in your face, smoother.<br />
Fall/winter- day/night- elegant and safe for every occasion. <br />
More masculine (to my nose). <br />
Enjoy this scent, its nice. <br />
Quite expensive especially because of the short lasting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1661739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1661739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1643036" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QuentinsBeach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1546186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="QuentinsBeach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1643036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1643036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1546186">QuentinsBeach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-11">09/11/22 16:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love it. It gets me reminiscing on future past lives in parallel universes. That synthetic ambroxan thing with frankincense is all a tad Comme Des Garcons /Gucci/Prada circa 2000. Lets all wear appropriately austere minimalist garbs and do our signage in 90s kanji fonts. This and Inimitable William Penhaligon are not far from each other with the freshness, and the ambroxan and incense, just that IWP is using the (Haitian?) vetiver and other things, and this Teddy dude has the leather so there's the hint of fruity sweetness that leather has, where IWP has that touch of green and wood. I think they're about 50% similar as fresh incense ambroxan experiences. This with a tad more projection might be a nice option, though thinking about it, that result might feel a little juvenile/commercial. I once was involuntarily squirted by an overzealous assistant with a Spicebomb flanker that reminded me of flyspray and I felt it obnoxiously projected, so we probably wouldn't actually want that with this profile.<br />
<br />
EDIT: Fades deeply into the background after 5-6 hours - by 8 hours huff extremely deep for even a faint trace of ashy powder metallic something, in contrast IWP's overall profile would be intact through the lingering phase, both sweet and green. Is this worth the money? Depends if there's something else with the same/similar profile and a bit more duration (which kind of rules out CdG). If not yeah, if that's how you want to smell, what else you gonna do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1643036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1643036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1639035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1639035" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1639035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1639035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-05">09/05/22 17:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Freshly cut pine with a soft frankincense aura, thats what Terrible Teddy is about a manly opinionated and unapologetic fragrance!<br />
<br />
Ambroxan is the star of the party emanating a clean and strong pine wood cloud Incense is also present, soft, aromatic and amazingly blended the leather comes out after a few hours, creamy and delicious.<br />
<br />
There are many Ambroxan perfumes out there and only a few can confidently say they are not trying to copy the rest, but rather create a new aroma Penhaligons does an amazing job reinterpreting such a well known olfactory profile to give us a completely different experience a very clean smoky pine scent with an ambery leather bottom.<br />
<br />
Projection is moderate and longevity is around 5 hours.<br />
<br />
An excellent alternative for Ambroxan lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1639035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1639035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1634868" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xyber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xyber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1634868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1634868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229204">Xyber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-31">08/31/22 01:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is so good on my skin. Smokey incense, leather, pepper and the lightest hint of something sweet and smooth. Decent longevity. Currently hunting a bargain bottle full.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1634868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1634868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1623300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1623300" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tiffanwy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tiffanwy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terrible Teddy"title="Terrible Teddy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1623300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1623300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341317">Tiffanwy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-14">08/14/22 02:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find this fragrance intoxicating. I first noticed it on a friend &amp; it made me want to climb him like a tree. Such a deep, sexy fragrance, not at all overpowering but definitely masculine and sexy. The combination of Incense, leather &amp; ambrosian is perfect. The initial spray is almost peppery. I notice insence first and then the softness of leather &amp; musk come through, leaving a sensual warmth - akin to patchouli - at it's heart. My nose doesn't pick up this fragrance on myself in the way it does when I notice others wearing it, but that is probably a good thing. I can't imagine ever tiring of this. It has become my signature fragrance. Terrible Teddy is terribly sexy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1623300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1623300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1607946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1607946" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kHartouN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kHartouN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1607946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1607946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538208">kHartouN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-21">07/21/22 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely adore this scent. Of all the fragrances I own this is definitely a top 3 contender.<br />
<br />
What I don't like is the price (way overpriced) and lack of any real silage/longevity. I feel you can get away wearing this pretty much anywhere, the versatility is brilliant however given the lack of any moderate longevity it really is only best suited for a night out/date night. Wearing this to the office by lunchtime no one will be smelling anything. It could just be how my nose works, but I don't smell a whole lot past the 4 hour mark. :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1607946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1607946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1599756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
For my husband, in this brand: Sam (cardamon &amp; tobacco) &gt; William (sandalwood &amp; vetiver) &gt; Teddy (ambroxan &amp; incense) &gt; Georges (wood)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I like the fragrance its clean, its simple, its fresh and more for a mature man. I like wearing this on evenings out. Not sure the price tag is justified.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1559776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1559776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512554" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daisy_D"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daisy_D" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512554ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512554" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353">Daisy_D</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-26">02/26/22 12:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, it's a bit rubbery and smells like some kind of glue at the first sniff.. Later, some part of the fragrance reminds of Byredo's Mixed Emotions, with a bit papyrus and birch kind of bright sense in it. It's better after it dries down..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1512554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1512554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512137" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512137ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512137" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-25">02/25/22 20:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Terrible? More like a whisper. Terrible teddy is the most all around basic incense-amber fragrance. I don't get any leather. Instead it focuses on a sweetened amber incense. It's very good, if it projected. This has a super super intimate projection and a not so great longevity. There's a very off-putting note near the dry down that I cannot name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1512137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1512137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1464620" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1464620" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dottie&#039;s Hoomum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1428748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dottie&#039;s Hoomum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elie-Saab/Le-Parfum-12258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Parfum"title="Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1464620ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1464620" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428748">Dottie&#039;s Hoomum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-16">12/16/21 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well.<br />
I spritzed this on my person in Harrods on one of my recent London gallivanting days.  Jumped on the tube and spritzed more in Selfridges.  I saw people on the Piccadilly line actually swoon as I passed them.  And they were wearing masks! I dont know why they market this as a mans fragrance.  Anybody could get away with it.   It really is rich and mouthwatering, and in spite of what the notes list says, I get zingy limes and plum jam and patchouli and rum.  Just absolutely beautiful and expensive smelling.  And expensive costing.   There you go.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1464620"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1464620#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1433797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1433797" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rob321x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rob321x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Pavillon-Rouge-51660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pavillon Rouge"title="Pavillon Rouge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1433797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1433797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1433797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1433797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1432938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1432938" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cocofluff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141155.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cocofluff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Bendelirious-4511.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4511.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bendelirious"title="Bendelirious"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1432938ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1432938" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155">cocofluff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-22">10/22/21 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very smoky and leathery. I'm not a fan of this one at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1432938"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1432938#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1427960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1427960" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1Constantine1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194400"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="1Constantine1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1427960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1427960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194400">1Constantine1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-14">10/14/21 07:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy boiled sweet. A sad example of corporate arrogance. Avoid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1427960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1427960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-05">10/05/21 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, what an interesting fragrance! I could see immediately how this would be polarizing. I'm generally a scent-wimp who equates the word "challenging" with "smells bad". Cumin is one note in particular that rubs my nose the wrong way, with its sweaty body odor vibe. And Terrible Teddy has hints of cumin. And animalics assault my nose as well if overdone or not well-controlled. Terrible Teddy has hints of animalics, in fact it's a listed accord here. But then this fragrance settles down and presents some sweetness (cinnamon,? cloves?) to tone down and counterbalance the challenging-ness. There's just a hint of funk, well blended by the counterbalancing sweet spices. And it dawned on me what, to me, best characterizes this fragrance: this is like a hybrid of Aramis (classic OG) and Creed Viking! I think of Aramis as good, interesting olfactory shelf art - a piece of art, but a difficult, challenging wear. I describe Aramis as smelling like a sweaty construction worker who just ate a big Mexican lunch with Cholula sauce. Or maybe Herms Bel Ami instead of Aramis. And I like Creed Viking,  which I characterize as sort of a fuller, niche-level ode to the traditional Bay Rum, with its sweet spices. I just think Terrible Teddy is an interesting combination of these general DNA's, and I think I like it! Surprisingly.  In fact this union is brilliant! Maybe pink pepper is a common connecting note? I would assume the listed notes of Incense and leather are actually accords formed by multiple identifiable notes. What an interesting,  funky, spicy fragrance.<br />
Update: And maybe another unexpected comparison: Maison Martin Margiela Replica line's Soul of the Forest on steroids.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1422904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1422904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1419233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1419233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1419233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1419233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-29">09/29/21 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SMOKE N' MIRRORS<br />
<br />
How can this easy-to-wear smokey delight have only 3 notes? (Must be the smoke n'mirrors trick.)<br />
I really enjoy the underplayed smoke and incense - great daytime scent that can be perfect for the office without offending. <br />
<br />
It's in the world of Elysium Cologne by Roja Dove - not saying it's similar - just saying that if you own Elysium, not sure you necessarily need to pick this one up unless it's a steal. <br />
<br />
Nice job, Penhaligon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1419233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1419233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1414456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1414456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="teh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="teh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pur-Oud-66436.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66436.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pur Oud"title="Pur Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1414456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1414456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398">teh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-21">09/21/21 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very beautiful opening with warm and slick frankincense the frankincense was too good that i got tricked into buying a full bottle impulsively Now Im writing this review in regret after wearing it a couple times as the dry down is overly synthetic and headache inducing to my nose (but I can see how this could be very pleasant to the majority of people) - pretty much a very good designer scent in disguise Also minus a few points for the tacky bottle and branding </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1414456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1414456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1411004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1411004" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Haito007"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.989171.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Haito007" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Guilty-Elixir-de-Parfum-pour-Homme-84547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme"title="Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1411004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1411004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989171">Haito007</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-15">09/15/21 13:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Terrible Teddy &amp; Lord George are the best of the portraits collection for me.<br />
<br />
I was really impressed by the clean, crisp &amp; warm nature of Teddy. The incense/leather combination would usually put me off a fragrance but both are so well executed in this fragrance it really works.<br />
<br />
The leather &amp; Incense are dialled back and the amber, ambroxan &amp; pepper are amped up which delivers a very elegant beautiful warm clean scent that I really enjoy. It smells completely different but the warm calm delivery of the fragrance reminds me of how I feel wearing Dior Homme Intense.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1411004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1411004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1410591" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1410591" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Woodynote"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339976"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1339976.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Woodynote" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terrible Teddy"title="Terrible Teddy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1410591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1410591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); soapy fresh, yet distinguished and aromatic. Peppery, yet smooth. Enticing and sensual, but rigid and assured. Like an introverted extrovert. <br />
<br />
Top note dissipates quickly, leaving a somewhat linear mid &amp; base note profile behind. Ive finally found the one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1410591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1410591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1403577" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-29">08/29/21 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't like leather fragrances as a general rule but I had a sample of this so I thought I might as well try it. It lasts a long time and projects well. It is also leather without being too harsh. Can pass as unisex, I'm female and I'd wear this. I'm not sure if I'd buy a full bottle, portraits are expensive so I'd be selective in which ones I bought and I like Lady Blanche and Mr Beauregard best so far. This is probably in my top 5 though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1400939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1400939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1366874" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1366874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1366874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-27">06/27/21 11:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Leather and incense, smells very "clean" I'm usually not into leather as a note but with the incense and ambroxan it works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1366874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1366874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1361869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lovethatsmellalot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1041098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1041098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lovethatsmellalot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1041098">lovethatsmellalot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-18">06/18/21 01:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like incense, turned down compared to a favorite incense scent, M Generation (no longer available, but a great one!), with some added pink pepper.  With the addition of black and pink pepper, Bang! or Clive Christian V come to mind.  It hits you deep in the back of your nasal passages with a nice, warm, peppery scent.  There is a leather that, while not as forward as the pepper and incense, could bring to mind horse saddles and reins, if you have ever been in the storage area of a stable, but only if you concentrate on that scent and the stable hard enough.  I love the rhinoceros bottle, with its sharp points.  The smaller recessed pointy horn behind the main, larger horn could quite literally draw blood.  This fragrance seems so serious.  I wish it had a lighter mood to it.  Where is the fun?<br />
<br />
The sprayer is amazing and perfect.  The label is paper,  why not something more protected?<br />
<br />
But what does it smell to a someone who is not a "fraghead"?<br />
<br />
Actual product reviews:<br />
"It smells nice but its very strong. Id say this is more for an older gentleman. It does dry down to a pleasant scent but its still on the strong side. Does remind me of creeds aventus. So if you like that fragrance then youll like this one. Great gift for a mature individual."<br />
<br />
"This fragrance reminds me of a stronger version of Creeds Aventus (definitely can smell the pink pepper and Ambroxan). Sillage is around approximately about 6-8 hours unisex fragrance and not for the faint of heart"<br />
"Very unique scent. Love it. I used to think nothing replace Aventis ... was wrong about it."<br />
"woody and delicious"<br />
"Amazing and unique smell. Very satisfied withe the purchase."<br />
"Recommend as a unisex scent. Very sexy"<br />
"I bought one for a family member. You will get amazed by the unique scent"<br />
"Amazing fragrance! I love smelling it on my husband. It goes on kind of strong, but the aftertaste is very gentle and sexy."<br />
"Want to smell like a man? Want to turn heads? Think Creed with class."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1361869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1361869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356140" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s.pellegrino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202602"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202602.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="s.pellegrino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Violet/Un-Air-d-Apogee-48516.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48516.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un Air dApoge"title="Un Air dApoge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202602">s.pellegrino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-07">06/07/21 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Personally I would probably not shell out the full bucks for this one, but I really do enjoy my sample: peppery and refreshing with a woody base. This is ambroxan done right, in my opinion - a very attractive scent. Excellent on a warm day, makes me feel clean and awake.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1356140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1356140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1355910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1355910" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ahntu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1267302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ahntu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1355910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1355910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); Thats it. Not for blind bind.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1355910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1355910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354972" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); Definitely not the best out of the Portraits Collection. I don't know if its just me but I am getting a Jo Malone Oud &amp; Bergamot resemblance out of this. Sillage and longevity is satisfactory. Mainly suited for night time wear or day time wear during the colder months. <br />
<br />
My overall rating: 6.5/ 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1354972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1354972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1352949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
