<br />
i like that they create a story for each of the portraits series. i can imagine a hunter like Teddy described by Penhaligon wearing this fragrance. <br />
<br />
even though this isnt my cup of tea, i do enjoy how it brings me immediately in to scene!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1335409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1335409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1278936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1278936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alanwake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alanwake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mad-et-Len/Paname-40981.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40981.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paname"title="Paname"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1278936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1278936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422">alanwake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-20">01/20/21 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it a lot. It's a bit odd, but very enjoyable, least to me. I get a strong blast of pink pepper, incense, and spices in the opening, with some patch and leather in the dry down. It's both warm and fresh at the same time, in the same vein as Resin Sacra. It's overall a frankincense frag, and a good one, as it isn't cloying or churchy smelling. Rather, smooth, polished, and reserved. I love the dry down, it's the best part of this fragrance. The price, however, is the worst part of this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1278936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1278936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1278878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1278878" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentManJojo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1060089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentManJojo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Noir-Ambre-42055.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42055.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Noir Ambre"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Noir Ambre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1278878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1278878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060089">ScentManJojo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-20">01/20/21 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An amazing quality juice from start to finish. For the 3 listed ingredients I find this to have an amazing wide range of hints of this and that. There is a bit of citrus at the start and some sweetness from somewhere. I find this about 2 hours in to be similar to Baldessarini. Both are slightly dusty, sweet and a little musky.  This is a fantastic juice. A top ten for sure. I would try before you buy due to pricing. Otherwise, Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1278878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1278878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1274543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1274543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cheessey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cheessey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1274543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1274543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293732">Cheessey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-11">01/11/21 20:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong Herb scent at the opening making it masculine. The leather does a good job at controlling the greenery and makes it a good Winter wear.<br />
The only thing is there isn't anything exciting about the fragrance. It is great for an office or anywhere you don't want to stick out, but it isn't a million dollar scent. It feels classy, like wearing a wool suit to work in winter. The only issue is there is no excitement. A Rhino is a good representation of this scent because it is fairly simple and to the point like the horn, but it is also strong and sturdy scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1274543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1274543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1250597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1250597" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="D-Bo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1011421"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1011421.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="D-Bo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1250597ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1250597" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1011421">D-Bo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-19">11/19/20 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get this big dose of Eucalyptus or something resembling camphor in the opening. Its quite herbaceous and almost green at the opening. <br />
<br />
The three notes dont accurately describe whats going on here. But I definitely understand where the other reviewers are going with the screechiness up top. Im not sure how I feel about this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1250597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1250597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1250098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1250098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ilgattopardo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265020.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ilgattopardo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Gris-Charnel-57038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Charnel"title="Gris Charnel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1250098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1250098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265020">ilgattopardo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-18">11/18/20 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the name Terrible Teddy is unfortunately quite spot on, as the experience is not very pleasant;<br />
the scent is simplistic, linear and quite abrasive, like a burst of chemicals or licking sandpaper, I imagine; nothing to round it up, counterbalance, give depth, besides some plasticky sweetness;<br />
as an afterthought lingers some medicinal, pharmaceutical undertone;<br />
I do enjoy a couple of scents from portraits line, despite regarding them as blatantly overpriced, but this is not one of them</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1250098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1250098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1217030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1217030" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpellegrino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.804692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpellegrino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1217030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1217030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692">cpellegrino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-27">08/27/20 23:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sharp to the nose, especially on opening. Since the notes are very simple, it's easy to make out the incense and leather. Ambroxan is supposed to be a substitute for ambergris and be musky-ambery. Right now I'm not a fan of this but it's summer, so I'll try again in fall and winter. I think this might be a scent that needs to be layered with another as it's too harsh on its own and needs something to mellow it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1217030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1217030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1193626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1193626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabearjew82"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202425"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202425.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabearjew82" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Naomi-Goodsir/Cuir-Velours-16581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuir Velours"title="Cuir Velours"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1193626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1193626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202425">dabearjew82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-27">06/27/20 21:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love it, other reviewers are losing the point of this line i think. The point of this line is to let two of three notes stick out. This one is spicy and very masculine without having to be very leathery or smoky. The opening is peppery so that part of other reviews is correct, but i love that part and wifey does as well. I just got coffee christian x and it's in that family, not saying it's up there, but in the same family and cheaper. Don't judge this one on its reviews without trying it on your skin after a shower. I have 4 scents from penhaligon and this may be 3rd, but I still like it allot. I have in order halfeti as 1, jumper sling as 2 (though that's a edt so didn't last very long), this and the marybell wood (this was limited and I like it but def last)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1193626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1193626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1157030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1157030" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="savacsaian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134033"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1134033.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="savacsaian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-Eau-Premiere-2015-31172.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31172.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 Eau Premiere (2015)"title="Chanel No 5 Eau Premiere (2015)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1157030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1157030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); <br />
Not staying for the drydown. Bye.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1157030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1157030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1146744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1146744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="soulmaker1000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222790"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="soulmaker1000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1146744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1146744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222790">soulmaker1000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-18">02/18/20 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a perfume with a lot of personality, different from all the others I have, I think it will not please most people, I personally found it fantastic, it smells kind of like incense and spices, just delicious and authentic, after a couple of hours it gets softer less spicy smell, but no less pleasant, still great.<br />
Perfect for fall and winter.<br />
It lasted about 6 hours on my skin, then became a skin scent for another 5 or 6 hours.<br />
I bought 2 bottles.<br />
I cannot say that it is the best perfume I have but it is certainly one of the most authentic ... If you can have many perfumes, think that this has to be in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1146744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1146744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1096174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1096174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1096174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1096174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-10">09/10/19 02:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Here's the lowdown on Teddy.<br />
<br />
It's not very good.<br />
<br />
I'm sorry Penhaligon's I'm a fan of the brand but many of this line are poorly conceived, poorly executed and not up to the standard of the regular line.<br />
<br />
Taste wise this fragrance is well up my street though. I impressed the lady in the store when identifying pink pepper in the opening. I don't know why she was impressed it's so blatant it's unbelievable, and as a schinus molle enthusiast I should be jumping for joy, especially in a broadly modern, unapologetically unnatural type of composition...but something about this isn't that great. <br />
Teddy lacks depth, it's that simple.   <br />
<br />
The opening is a spicy, incense accord and for all the pink pepper and actually a cumin/caraway character creeping in, it feels a little flat and lifeless. Teddy didn't last very well on my skin either. I'm sorry because the Rhino stopper is one of the coolest so far.<br />
<br />
I have a sample so I guess I'll wear it again properly but I doubt my opinion will change.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Let this serve as a reminder not to judge to hastily based on a spritz on your hand in store. To be fair I did state that I loved pink pepper and incense and that Teddy smelled great in the opening, but like some 'bro' Youtuber I got all fixated on 'performance' and value for money. I stick to what I said about the line and Penhaligon's pushing out the releases as if they are on some treadmill, but Birsch's efforts here are decent and Teddy is a fascinating, sparkly pink pepper and incense accord which smells remarkably sweet airy, with a hint of leather tinged smoke, smooth but with some jagged angularity to it. It's fresh and uplifting to me, not quite as much as some (cruely) Olibanum based incense because it has slightly more heft,  Labdanum and frankincense being prominent. Truth is I'd rather have this than the one I own Lord George and I'm reasonably fond of George so that's praise indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1096174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1096174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1095217" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1095217" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marioslg3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.71654.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marioslg3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Oud-Ulya-71108.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71108.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Ulya"title="Oud Ulya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1095217ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1095217" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71654">marioslg3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-06">09/06/19 23:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im surprised about the rating of this perfume.  I love it, is masculine and grown up scent.  It has good longevity and sillage.  Although im not particularly loving abroxan, the compination with insence amd leather is fantastic.  The insence is stronger at the begining but then calms down and blends very well with the other notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1095217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1095217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1093156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1093156" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gridlockd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gridlockd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1093156ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1093156" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196013">Gridlockd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-31">08/31/19 11:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a 3ml tester from Penthaligon's<br />
<br />
Opening smells exactly like sticking your nose into a bag of raw frankincense.<br />
<br />
Dry down is fresh pine wood and frankincense smoke. <br />
<br />
Very strongly takes me back to sitting on a wooden pew in a COE church.<br />
<br />
A classy grown up formal scent but not much to be excited about</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1093156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1093156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1091793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1091793" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shushkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shushkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/White-Queen-51566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Queen"title="White Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1091793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1091793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159">shushkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-27">08/27/19 02:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another very simple fragrance from Penhaligon. Ok, says its for men up top. Ignore. It's unisex.<br />
It's not hard to pick out what is in this surprisingly light weight scent.<br />
On me it's largely ambroxan. What little leather there is does not make much of a  impact until the ambroxan finally eases off. Finally the incense joins the leather. <br />
Come on Penhaligon?! It's time to fly the union Jack high and proud. Stop churning out cheap fragrance in gorgeous classy bottles. The juice really does matter.<br />
You have created some real beauties in your illustrious history like Luna, Savoy Steam and Halfeti. Don't lose your way.<br />
Poor longevity and sillage. Well you get hit with a cloud of ambroxan but that's only for 15 minutes or so.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1091793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1091793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1067977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1067977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GeorgeY"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/914441"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.914441.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GeorgeY" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1067977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1067977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/914441">GeorgeY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-07">06/07/19 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>02-06-2019<br />
<br />
I tried it on card in Harrods. The opening is pretty decent I have to say, very dry, leathery vetiver, papyrus and smoky guaiac woods wrapped up with a warm pink pepper.<br />
<br />
Really like it but unfortunately the dry down falls really flat and losses all its power.<br />
<br />
The dryness, leatheriness and smokiness are all gone. It feels like the opening you are drinking whisky, then switched to Vodka in the dry down.<br />
<br />
A bit disappointed, but may give it another shot<br />
<br />
The cap is pretty cool</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1067977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1067977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1096174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1096174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1096174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1096174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-10">09/10/19 02:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Here's the lowdown on Teddy.<br />
<br />
It's not very good.<br />
<br />
I'm sorry Penhaligon's I'm a fan of the brand but many of this line are poorly conceived, poorly executed and not up to the standard of the regular line.<br />
<br />
Taste wise this fragrance is well up my street though. I impressed the lady in the store when identifying pink pepper in the opening. I don't know why she was impressed it's so blatant it's unbelievable, and as a schinus molle enthusiast I should be jumping for joy, especially in a broadly modern, unapologetically unnatural type of composition...but something about this isn't that great. <br />
Teddy lacks depth, it's that simple.   <br />
<br />
The opening is a spicy, incense accord and for all the pink pepper and actually a cumin/caraway character creeping in, it feels a little flat and lifeless. Teddy didn't last very well on my skin either. I'm sorry because the Rhino stopper is one of the coolest so far.<br />
<br />
I have a sample so I guess I'll wear it again properly but I doubt my opinion will change.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Let this serve as a reminder not to judge to hastily based on a spritz on your hand in store. To be fair I did state that I loved pink pepper and incense and that Teddy smelled great in the opening, but like some 'bro' Youtuber I got all fixated on 'performance' and value for money. I stick to what I said about the line and Penhaligon's pushing out the releases as if they are on some treadmill, but Birsch's efforts here are decent and Teddy is a fascinating, sparkly pink pepper and incense accord which smells remarkably sweet airy, with a hint of leather tinged smoke, smooth but with some jagged angularity to it. It's fresh and uplifting to me, not quite as much as some (cruely) Olibanum based incense because it has slightly more heft,  Labdanum and frankincense being prominent. Truth is I'd rather have this than the one I own Lord George and I'm reasonably fond of George so that's praise indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1096174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1096174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1278936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1278936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alanwake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alanwake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mad-et-Len/Paname-40981.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40981.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paname"title="Paname"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1278936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1278936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422">alanwake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-20">01/20/21 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it a lot. It's a bit odd, but very enjoyable, least to me. I get a strong blast of pink pepper, incense, and spices in the opening, with some patch and leather in the dry down. It's both warm and fresh at the same time, in the same vein as Resin Sacra. It's overall a frankincense frag, and a good one, as it isn't cloying or churchy smelling. Rather, smooth, polished, and reserved. I love the dry down, it's the best part of this fragrance. The price, however, is the worst part of this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1278936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1278936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138783" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlucarDFirecaT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlucarDFirecaT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Black-Eau-de-Toilette-18368.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18368.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Eau de Toilette"title="Black Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516130">AlucarDFirecaT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a beautiful discovery!<br />
<br />
An incense, leather aerial and light, which develops and surrounds you with ease!<br />
This one is clearly in the DNA of the house Comme des Garons , and it could be the big brother of incense Kyoto more tenacious.<br />
<br />
Do not rely on the reduced list of notes, it is much deeper than announced, a smell of very light cypress, vtiver and tobacco comes lightened leather incense always in the background, it is a linear fragrance without evolution, but in his case this is rather an advantage because it makes it a safe all-day fragrance!<br />
<br />
Teddy is in the end terribly well made and effective, a real perfume of gentlemen</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2138783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2138783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1095217" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71654">marioslg3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-06">09/06/19 23:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im surprised about the rating of this perfume.  I love it, is masculine and grown up scent.  It has good longevity and sillage.  Although im not particularly loving abroxan, the compination with insence amd leather is fantastic.  The insence is stronger at the begining but then calms down and blends very well with the other notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1095217"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1095217#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1278878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1278878" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentManJojo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1060089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentManJojo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Noir-Ambre-42055.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42055.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Noir Ambre"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Noir Ambre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1278878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1278878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060089">ScentManJojo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-20">01/20/21 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An amazing quality juice from start to finish. For the 3 listed ingredients I find this to have an amazing wide range of hints of this and that. There is a bit of citrus at the start and some sweetness from somewhere. I find this about 2 hours in to be similar to Baldessarini. Both are slightly dusty, sweet and a little musky.  This is a fantastic juice. A top ten for sure. I would try before you buy due to pricing. Otherwise, Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1278878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1278878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="55441" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398">teh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-21">09/21/21 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very beautiful opening with warm and slick frankincense the frankincense was too good that i got tricked into buying a full bottle impulsively Now Im writing this review in regret after wearing it a couple times as the dry down is overly synthetic and headache inducing to my nose (but I can see how this could be very pleasant to the majority of people) - pretty much a very good designer scent in disguise Also minus a few points for the tacky bottle and branding </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This is it...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1342810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1342810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1250098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1250098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ilgattopardo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265020.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ilgattopardo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Gris-Charnel-57038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Charnel"title="Gris Charnel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1250098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1250098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265020">ilgattopardo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-18">11/18/20 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the name Terrible Teddy is unfortunately quite spot on, as the experience is not very pleasant;<br />
the scent is simplistic, linear and quite abrasive, like a burst of chemicals or licking sandpaper, I imagine; nothing to round it up, counterbalance, give depth, besides some plasticky sweetness;<br />
as an afterthought lingers some medicinal, pharmaceutical undertone;<br />
I do enjoy a couple of scents from portraits line, despite regarding them as blatantly overpriced, but this is not one of them</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1250098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1250098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324511" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324511ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324511" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 23:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Terrible Teddy is Valaya's husband. They have plans to do a lot of evil things. While Valaya shrieks to scare people, Teddy will do the stabbing. This Quentin Bisch creation is an abomination. I cannot pick out any ambery notes in it, only citrusy woody creepy notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="2324511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=2324511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1217030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1217030" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpellegrino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.804692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpellegrino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1217030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1217030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692">cpellegrino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-27">08/27/20 23:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very sharp to the nose, especially on opening. Since the notes are very simple, it's easy to make out the incense and leather. Ambroxan is supposed to be a substitute for ambergris and be musky-ambery. Right now I'm not a fan of this but it's summer, so I'll try again in fall and winter. I think this might be a scent that needs to be layered with another as it's too harsh on its own and needs something to mellow it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="55441"comment_id="1217030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Terrible-Teddy-55441.html?ccid=1217030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="55441" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Sauvage Elixir carries the recognizable Sauvage DNA, enriched with darker and warmer nuances. Its character is solid, strong and confident.">by
            <em>francesco_grieco</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1763409.jpg"

    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.90467.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Flower-Knows/Swan-Soloist-90467.html#cc2367110"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Flower Knows</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Swan Soloist</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Seconding every word the reviewer below left, but especially when they described Swan Soloist to be an exact dupe of Penhaligon&#039;s Luna with (much) poorer longevity and sillage. Luna is my signature scent and the one that gets me the most compliments so I am WELL familiar with it, and this is...">by
            <em>P1034811</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69248.png"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>

    <script>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
